text: Delfim Carlos de Carvalho, Barão de Passagem. Delfim Carlos de Carvalho (13 April 1825, in Rio de Janeiro – 19 May 1896, in Rio de Janeiro), Baron of the Passagem, was a Brazilian naval officer who fought in the War of Paraguay. He was a Chief of Division at the Battle of the Riachuelo. He commanded the squadron that effected the Passage of Humaitá on 19 February 1868. He was also a member of the Supreme Military Justice in 1891. ==References== *Archivo Nobiliarchico Brasileiro at https://archive.org/stream/archivonobiliarc00vascuoft#page/32/mode/2up p. 341\. * Category:People of the Paraguayan War Category:Titles of nobility in the Americas Category:Brazilian nobility Category:1825 births Category:1896 deaths
title: Delfim Carlos de Carvalho, Baron of the Passagem
